page.title: 15Mynydd Seion Chapel
page.content:
Mynydd Seion is a Welsh Presbyterian Methodist Chapel with 300-400 members The Minister is the Rev. Isaac Jones. He has a wife Nancy and 3 children. Mynydd Seion has 14 Deacons. Services are held each Sunday at 10 am and 5.30 with a Sunday School at 2 pm. The Services are well attended.
On a Tuesday evening there is a Band of Hope at 5.30pm followed by a 'Seiat' at 7 pm. United Prayer Meeting is held on the 1st Tuesday of the month.
There are various committees in connection with the Chapel and many activies to interest members.
